item.title: Both Text and Images Leaked! A Systematic Analysis of Multimodal LLM Data Contamination
item.description: MM-Detect: a novel framework detects contamination in multimodal LLMs, enhancing benchmark reliability by identifying training set leakage and improving performance evaluations.
